tool_description: Create real-time polls with live comments.
name: polstir
title: polstir

/polls/delete

required_parameters.name: id

api_list.name: /polls/update
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polstir.p.rapidapi.com/polls/update"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polstir.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://polstir.p.rapidapi.com/polls/update"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polstir.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
